ED_Title: Commemoration of the fortieth anniversary of the adoption and opening for signature of the United Nations Convention on the Law of the Sea
ED_DecisionText:
A 

At its 48th plenary meeting, on 8 December 2022, the General Assembly, in accordance with rule 81 of its rules of procedure, decided to reconsider the provision contained in paragraph 2 of the annex to its resolution 77/5 of 2 November 2022.  

B 

At its 48th plenary meeting, on 8 December 2022, the General Assembly, on the proposal of its President, decided that a plenary meeting devoted to the commemoration of the fortieth anniversary of the adoption and opening for signature of the United Nations Convention on the Law of the Sea would also feature a statement by the Permanent Representative of Singapore to the United Nations, His Excellency Burhan Gafoor, in lieu of a statement by the President of the Third United Nations Conference on the Law of the Sea.
ED_Disclaimer: The final version of decisions adopted during the main part of the session will be contained in document A/77/49 (Vol. II) after editorial review.
